titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Lakeland Circle records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons

did.unittitle: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Lakeland Circle records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Lakeland, Michigan Circle of Christian interdenominational service organization supporting various ministries, including to the aged, the handicapped, and the underprivileged.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minute book, 1963-1980; minute books of meetings of past presidents, 1959-1976; binder containing history, clippings, photographs, and programs of the circle and of the Livingston County branch, 1920s-1973.

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons
